other_tests.procedure_name: Endoscopic removal of stone(s) from biliary tract

other_tests.findings: No evidence of focal lesions or textural abnormality in the liver; no intrahepatic biliary dilatation; common bile duct measures 8 mm at the porta hepatis tapering to 6 mm distally; cholelithiasis with a distended gallbladder and mild wall edema; tenderness over the entire upper abdomen; pancreas not well visualized due to overlying bowel gas.
